name: Evil Lands: MMO RPG
description:
Do you have what it takes to prevail in the battle with evil? Become a real hero and fight the monsters hiding in Evil Lands! The most captivating fantasy RPG game for mobile has arrived. Choose your character, complete quests and join other players on the path to destroy the grim creatures. Explore the magical environment, master your skills and become the bravest warrior of all! You can challenge yourself in one of two multiplayer modes: CO-OP or PVP. Play with your friends and people from all over the World!

- Online Real-Time Multiplayer RPG
- Stunning 3D graphics
- Character classes, upgrades, skills and items
- Variety of maps and captivating quests
- Cooperative and PVP modes

ONLINE REAL-TIME MULTIPLAYER

Invite your friends and take a step on this journey together! You can meet players from all around the World and play with or against them. The adventure awaits!

AMAZING GRAPHICS

Evil Lands features stunning console-like graphics that will simply blow you away. It’s hard to resist stopping between battles to take some screenshots!

CHARACTER CUSTOMIZATION

Who are you? A warrior, sorceress or assassin? Upgrade your attributes, learn new skills, collect your gear and become the greatest hero.

VARIOUS MAPS AND QUESTS

From Skylark Fields all the way to Coldwater Peaks - cross the haunted realm of Evil Lands in your mission to fight the darkness. Compelling quests make this action RPG even more exciting than a regular hack’n’slash!

TWO GAMEPLAY MODES

Cooperative mode lets you immerse in the exciting battle against evil while joining forces with other players. If you’re in for more thrill, try the PVP combat mode - team up and challenge each other to find out who runs the Evil Lands world!

SUPPORTED DEVICES

Evil Lands requires 2GB of RAM.
Minimum requirements: iPhone 6S, 6S Plus, 7, 7 Plus, 8, 8 Plus, X, XR, XS, XS Max, iPad Air 2,3, iPad Pro, iPad Mini 4, 5
The game DOES NOT support: iPhone 5S, 6, 6 Plus, iPad Mini 2, 3; iPad Air; iPod Touch
publishers: RAGE QUIT GAMES SPOLKA Z O O SPOLKA KOMANDYTOWA
